name: Only One (itch) (Anxiety Trifle, ACJOKERZ)
description:
3D Gravity Bending Platformer with an emphasis on speed.

Jailed in a space prison, your only hope of escape is the mysterious gravity flipping device you find on your wrist. Run, jump and gravity flip your way to freedom.

Only One utilises 90-degree gravity flipping. Jump from floor to wall to ceiling, traversing courses that test the speed of your wits as you compete against the clock.
